label: Task-5
title: Set up LocalStack testing in CI
description: Add LocalStack Docker service to CI pipeline for unit testing of deployment components. Mirror every app__deploy__aws__* component test against LocalStack (S3, Lambda, IAM). This enables deployment testing without real AWS credentials. Configure LocalStack services needed: s3, lambda, iam. Add pytest fixtures for LocalStack endpoints.

properties.acceptance_criteria: LocalStack runs in CI. Component lifecycle tests (create/verify/delete/verify_deleted) pass against LocalStack. No real AWS credentials needed for unit tests.
